module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *12.0.36* Unlock UCP fixes (adding ip address restrictions) *12.0.35* FREEPBX-8491, Makes security and update notices come from address set in sysadmin, FREEPBX-8380 Exclude Update Notifications for Disabled Modules, FREEPBX-8287 some work on less to css generation *12.0.34* FREEPBX-8632 Third Party Key Signatures not working *12.0.33* Autologin param was failing validation *12.0.32* Fix Module Admin caching issue *12.0.31* Increase reload time by setting a timeout on gpg key check *12.0.30* Speedier check online, FREEPBX-8491 Update Notices Not Coming from Correct E-mail *12.0.29* Simple fix as a last result situation *12.0.28* Display notice for switching out of beta mode in module admin *12.0.27* Method find functionality fixes *12.0.26* Performance improvements *12.0.25* If there is a problem with GPG dont kill FreePBX *12.0.24* Be smarter about setting the permissions *12.0.23* Permissions on freepbx.conf *12.0.22* FREEPBX-8506 amportal chown should chown asterisk home directory *12.0.20* FREEPBX-8410 Permissions *12.0.21* Dont restrict mons during UCP CLI commands *12.0.20* Enable astman during some UCP CLI commands *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8403 During the cron job nightly check send output into the background *12.0.18* Word wrap in the installer window *12.0.17* Set button default value to a truth false, not a truthy false *12.0.16* Define default layout additions or it breaks *12.0.15* Layout changes and additions *12.0.14* FREEPBX-8402 Syntax in GPG *12.0.13* Beta track module admin fixes *12.0.12* Better backtracing when exceptions are thrown to users *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8258 Replace instead of insert *12.0.10* Better module signing text *12.0.9* Sub Depends checking *12.0.8* Catch exceptions gracefully *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8213 Stop never ending CLI install loops *12.0.6* Remove the last of the sounds from the sounds folder *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8190 signature fixes, FREEPBX-8102 allow modules to be removed that have missing dependencies *12.0.4* KV Recovery and fixes for installer *12.0.3* Fixes to check online *12.0.2* First Stable Release of 12
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
